name: phlexicon
description: A phonetic catalog for lexicons: Study a language. Document vocabulary. Analyze accents.
author: https://github.com/mxskylar

scripts.compile: rm -rf build && tsc && cp src/*.html build && cp src/*.css build && cp node_modules/bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css build && cp node_modules/bootstrap/dist/js/bootstrap.bundle.min.js build
